Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to repeal certain provisions of the Act entitled "An Act to amend the Bretton Woods Agreements Act to authorize the United States to participate in the Supplementary Financing Facility of the International Monetary Fund", approved on October 10, 1978 (P.L. 95-435), relating to the Republic of Uganda, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends an Act amending the Bretton Woods Agreement Act to repeal: (1) the prohibition against Ugandan imports into the United States; (2) the support for international actions against Uganda; and (3) the prohibition of exports to Uganda.

titles.title: A bill to repeal certain provisions of the Act entitled "An Act to amend the Bretton Woods Agreements Act to authorize the United States to participate in the Supplementary Financing Facility of the International Monetary Fund", approved on October 10, 1978 (P.L. 95-435), relating to the Republic of Uganda, and for other purposes.
